title: [Infra] Build publishing - Opt-in into strict checking of default branch registration
body:
### Context

https://github.com/dotnet/arcade-services/issues/4276

To prevent this - a new opt-in logic has been added into arcade. Let's adopt it in 

https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/blob/c03b15ef99b52a89a4942eacec42f4dfe0f5bc55/.vsts-dotnet.yml#L307-L312

By adding `requireDefaultChannels: true`

This just needs to wait for the new arcade to be consumed.
